privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: FORMĒ LLP (hereinafter referred to as "we", "the Company") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Policy describes what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.
privacy.section1Text: When using our mobile application and website, we may collect the following data:
privacy.section2Text: We use the collected data to:
section2Items: Provide access to fitness club services
Send notifications about bookings, promotions, and club news
Track visit statistics and training progress
Improve the quality of our services
privacy.section3Text: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except as required by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan, and to ensure service operation (hosting, push notifications).
privacy.section4Text: Your data is stored on secure servers using encryption. We take all necessary technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access to your data. Data is retained for the duration of your account and 30 days after its deletion.
section5Items: Request access to your personal data
privacy.section6Text: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.section7Text: For privacy inquiries, you can contact us at:

deleteAccount.title: Personal Data Deletion
deleteAccount.subtitle: Request to delete your account and personal data
deleteAccount.intro: In accordance with the data protection laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan, you have the right to request complete deletion of your data from our system.
whatDeletedItems: Personal data (name, phone, email, date of birth)
deleteAccount.processStep1: Send a deletion request via email or WhatsApp, providing the phone number linked to your account
deleteAccount.processStep2: We will verify your identity within 1 business day
deleteAccount.processStep3: Your data will be completely deleted within 30 days
deleteAccount.processStep4: You will receive confirmation of data deletion
deleteAccount.noteText: Account recovery is not possible after data deletion. If you have an active membership, we recommend waiting until it expires before deleting your account. Data required for contractual obligations or legal requirements may be retained for the period established by law.
